text: Randomization. Participants were randomized to CT-PTSD or WL. A minimization procedure with stratification according to age (<14 vs. ≥ 14 years), gender, symptom severity (<28 vs. ≥ 28, derived from previous trial; Smith et al., 2007) on the Child PTSD Symptom Scale (CPSS; Foa, Johnson, Feeny, & Treadwell, 2001 ; Cronbach's a = .89) and pretreatment diagnosis (i.e. meeting both DSM-IV and PTSD-AA criteria vs. PTSD-AA criteria) was used to ensure each trial arm was suitably matched on variables that might moderate outcome.
sentences: Participants were randomized to CT-PTSD or WL.

A minimization procedure with stratification according to age (<14 vs. ≥ 14 years), gender, symptom severity (<28 vs. ≥ 28, derived from previous trial; Smith et al., 2007) on the Child PTSD Symptom Scale (CPSS; Foa, Johnson, Feeny, & Treadwell, 2001 ; Cronbach's a = .89) and pretreatment diagnosis (i.e. meeting both DSM-IV and PTSD-AA criteria vs. PTSD-AA criteria) was used to ensure each trial arm was suitably matched on variables that might moderate outcome.
